txt.en:
'This next task you cannot possibly succeed at alone, or even with a fellowship of your closest allies. Nay, you must assemble a war-party if you are to defeat Bogbereth. 

'No ordinary creature is she, Bogbereth, the Poison-queen of Himbar. You must strike swift and true against her, for her hide is as steel armour and her fangs are keen-edged daggers, dripping venom.

'Assemble your band of heroes and journey back to Torech-i-Bogbereth. You will find her there, unless she finds you first.'
'The great beast is fallen? Then her poisonous reign is ended. This has been another blow to the Iron Crown and the forces of Angmar, and we owe it all to you and your allies.'
'Have you assembled your war-band yet? Bogbereth will not fall without a fight, and despite your courage, you are no threat to her by yourself.'
Lunathron told you of a great, vile spider, Bogbereth, which hunts in Himbar.

Bogbereth hunts in the north-east reaches of Himbar, west and then north of Gath Forthnír.\n\nLunathron cautioned you not to face Bogbereth with anything less than a fully-armed war-party. She must be defeated, lest she continues to spawn more of her foul brood.

Gath Forthnír is in the eastern part of Himbar, south and east of Torech-i-Bogbereth.\n\nLunathron bade you destroy the great spider, Bogbereth. Now that she is no more, you can return to claim your victory.
